title: Is it compulsory to study botany with zoology hons? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, but at most of the job vacancies they demand combination of these two in India if you are going for government teacher job otherwise it does not matter. you can go for chemistry or biotech instead in combination. So if your goal is clear check out its qualification and then choose. You can choose other combination of subjects according to your intrest.

No but the choices depend on the college and university. At Presidency college, Calcutta, you can opt for physiology and physics along with zoology (Hons). I do not know about other colleges and universities.
